Uses of Class
examples.patterns.decorator.Entity

  • Packages that use Entity 
    Package Description
    examples.patterns.decorator  

    • Uses of Entity in examples.patterns.decorator

      Subclasses of Entity in examples.patterns.decorator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Equipment
      Abstract class that all decorations inherit from.
      class  LeatherArmour
      Simple decorator class that assigns it's defence value in it's constructor, and uses it in the getDefence method.
      class  Player
      Concrete class to be decorated by Equipment subclasses.
      class  ShortSword
      Simple decorator class that assigns it's strength value in it's constructor, and uses it in the getAttack method.
